nodes.text: Noctralis was a planet where Trachta was grievously injured during the Clone Wars. He and a group of clone troopers were hunting a Jedi Padawan who defected to the Confederacy of Independent Systems when the Padawan threw a thermal detonator, killing the troopers and injuring Trachta. The planet was dark and had spindly-looking dead trees.

Noctralis likely derived its name from the word "nocturnal," which means active at night. The planet first appeared in the third part of Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison, in which it was seen through flashbacks recounting Trachta's disfigurement. Its location in the Expansion Region was confirmed in an update to the Star Wars: Essential Atlas Online Companion.
